item.description: This will be the first Meetup for this group so we will begin by reviewing the origin and major tenents of A Course in Miracles, sharing our own experience with the Course (new or old), and talk about how we would like the group to function. I have many ideas but would like to hear what others are looking for as well. I am very excited about connecting with others interested in A Course in Miracles!

group.name: Connecticut A Course In Miracles Study Group

item.name: New ACIM Group Starting
